'''Hussein Salem''' {{lang-ar|Ø­Ø³ÙÙ Ø³Ø§ÙÙ}}, is an [[Egypt]]ian businessman, co-owner of the [[East Mediterranean Gas Company]] (EMG),<ref>{{cite web|url=http://ipsnews.net/news.asp?idnews=56399 |title=MIDEAST: Egypt-Israel Gas Pipeline Targeted - IPS |publisher=Ipsnews.net |date= |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref> and ally and advisor to former president [[Hosni Mubarak]]. He is also the chairman and CEO of HKS Group, a hospitality company that operates Maritim Jolie Ville Resort in [[Sharm El Sheikh]].<ref>{{cite web|last=Bradley |first=Matt |url=http://online.wsj.com/article/SB10001424052702303499204576390063504168454.html?mod=googlenews_wsj |title=Mubarak Associate is Arrested in Spain - WSJ.com |publisher=Online.wsj.com |date=2011-06-16 |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref> He has been described as "one of the most secretive businessmen in Egypt",<ref name="sfgate1"/> a mogul,<ref name="thedailynewsegypt1"/> and Mubarak's close confidant.<ref name="autogenerated1"/>
+
'''Hussein Salem''' ({{lang-ar|Ø­Ø³ÙÙ Ø³Ø§ÙÙ}}), is an [[Egypt]]ian businessman, co-owner of the [[East Mediterranean Gas Company]] (EMG),<ref>{{cite web|url=http://ipsnews.net/news.asp?idnews=56399 |title=MIDEAST: Egypt-Israel Gas Pipeline Targeted - IPS |publisher=Ipsnews.net |date= |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref> and ally and advisor to former president [[Hosni Mubarak]]. He is also the chairman and CEO of HKS Group, a hospitality company that operates Maritim Jolie Ville Resort in [[Sharm El Sheikh]].<ref>{{cite web|last=Bradley |first=Matt |url=http://online.wsj.com/article/SB10001424052702303499204576390063504168454.html?mod=googlenews_wsj |title=Mubarak Associate is Arrested in Spain - WSJ.com |publisher=Online.wsj.com |date=2011-06-16 |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref> He has been described as "one of the most secretive businessmen in Egypt",<ref name="sfgate1"/> a mogul,<ref name="thedailynewsegypt1"/> and Mubarak's close confidant.<ref name="autogenerated1"/>
Salem fled Egypt during the [[Egyptian revolution of 2011]] on February 3. A warrant for his arrest was issued by the [[Interpol|International Criminal Police]] (Interpol) in May, 2011.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://english.ahram.org.eg/~/NewsContent/3/12/14879/Business/Economy/Mubaraks-UK-fortune-%C2%A3-million-Ambassador.aspx |title=Mubarak's UK fortune Â£40 million: Ambassador - Economy - Business - Ahram Online |publisher=English.ahram.org.eg |date=2011-06-23 |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref> He was later arrested at his vacation home in [[Mallorca]], [[Spain]] on June 14.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://english.ahram.org.eg/~/NewsContent/1/64/15223/Egypt/Politics-/Israel-gas-deal-case-postponed.aspx |title=Israel gas deal case postponed - Politics - Egypt - Ahram Online |publisher=English.ahram.org.eg |date=2011-06-28 |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref> Salem is currently under investigation for corruption, on charges he bribed Mubarak and his family to gain a monopoly on the sale of gas to Israel,<ref name="autogenerated1">{{cite web|url=http://articles.cnn.com/2011-05-14/world/egypt.israel.al.Sabil.gas_1_gas-deal-gas-exports-british-thermal-units/2?_s=PM:WORLD |title=Israel gas deal sparks attacks in Egypt - Page 2 - CNN |publisher=Articles.cnn.com |date=2011-05-14 |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref><ref name="sfgate1">{{cite web|url=http://articles.sfgate.com/2011-06-17/news/29668649_1_asylum-seekers-oil-theft-refugees |title=News of the Day From Across the Globe - SFGate |publisher=Articles.sfgate.com |date=2011-06-17 |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref> and for squandering public funds by selling Egyptian natural gas to Israel at below market prices.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.ynetnews.com/articles/0,7340,L-4083337,00.html |title=Report: Wanted Egypt businessman arrested in Spain - Israel News, Ynetnews |publisher=Ynetnews.com |date=1995-06-20 |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|last=Palazzolo |first=Joe |url=http://blogs.wsj.com/corruption-currents/2011/06/17/high-tide-from-swiss-innovations-to-separate-un-sanctions/?mod=google_news_blog |title=High Tide: From Swiss Innovations To Separate UN Sanctions - Corruption Currents - WSJ |publisher=Blogs.wsj.com |date=2011-06-17 |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref> Salem's trial in Egypt began on August 3, 2011.<ref name="thedailynewsegypt1">{{cite web|url=http://thedailynewsegypt.com/egypt/top-egyptian-officials-involved-in-facilitating-israel-gas-deal-say-leaked-documents.html |title=Top Egyptian officials involved in facilitating Israel gas deal, say leaked documents |publisher=Thedailynewsegypt.com |date= |accessdate=2011-07-08}}</ref>
